Hey guys I have an SSH server and an FTP: what do you need help with?
I want to transfer, files from my FTP server to my SSH server, is there ay way of doing it without downloading the files to my computer first?
I assume you can log on to your FTP server?
you should be able to use this document to complete your task

Limitation: You can't move files between two remote computers. Either the source or destination must be a local file. However, if you log in to a remote machine with ssh, you can copy files between two remote machines on that machine's command-line.
once you are logged in to your FTP server you should be able to initiate the scp transfer from it
you can also do entire folders
do you have a GUI on your FTP server?
I would use the command line then
unless your GUI will give you a command line
